title: EEEEEEK! LP lost from being locked out by server, please help
body:
Hey, I never have issues like this, I went to get in the match, It said that simple "Try to reconnect y/n?" thingy

Over and over I did the reset

didn't work, 

for seven minutes im sitting there redoing my client 

would not let me in

so now I got this remake screen on my thing, it calls me a leaver, and tells me i lose 15 lp, which is about the same as a loss

I mean like... in comparison A dodge is 3lp for someone who willingly decides not to participate. with 5 minute leaver buster... So for a connectivity issue (Which is hard to believe my internet is fine right now) I get punished as if i lost a match, which is harsher than dodge punishment. I didn't dodge though
I really want that LP back, because im in hell, where it takes an hour to get a game closed out as there just isn't enough coordination to do that final hole punch (On either side admittedly) 

so I just lost an hour of work because of that, please help me, I just got screwed so hard

replies.body: Sorry you went through this, with LP and leaverbuster to boot.  :(  There were ISP issues last night, especially for those on the east coast.  We aren't able to restore ranked stats, but reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  I can't guarantee removing leaverbuster caused by an external issue, but we do like to look at each case individually.
maybe we'll resolve it with rito
